Package scrabble

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Board holds the the 15x15 grid of Square objects.
    BoardPos
    BoardPos represents a single cell in the scrabble Board.
    Frame
    Frame acts as the tray of 7 tiles given to each player.
    Main  
    Player
    Player holds the name and tracks the score of the player.
    Pool
    Pool acts as a bag of Tile that the players can take tiles from at random.
    Square  
    WordPlacement  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Tile
    Tile represents an unplaced tile inside the Pool
    WordPlacement.Direction
